chunks.content: Kubernetes deployments allow you to declaratively update applications. You describe a desired state in a Deployment, and the controller changes the actual state to match.
StatefulSets are used for stateful applications that require stable network identifiers. Each pod in a StatefulSet has a persistent identifier maintained across rescheduling.
ConfigMaps allow you to decouple configuration from container images. This separation enables portable and reusable application configurations.
